page.title: 14Family Animals
page.content: To have animals as pets seems very popular in the area.These fall into 3 main categories. The first is conventional pets like rabbits,cats,gerbils,dogs and goldfish.Then there are ponies or sheepdogs which are part hobby, part pet.Finally there are animals linked with the farm such as goats and poultry, which are as much investment and income as friends of the family.With the availability of fields and buildings in the area both the second and the third groups are widespread.Often local events involve some of the animals and therefore are well supported.Shows like those at Alne,Husthwaite and even Harrogate assume an important place in the calender.
